intro.mainTitle: The first ride platform with 0% commission
intro.subTitle: Launch planned for september 2021

login.downloadTheApp: Download the App to create an account

driverProcess.toStartup: You are joining a new era in the transport business
driverProcess.processDesc: The process will take few minutes and is subject to verification by our team.

step1.title: Documents
step1.titleText: We will need a few documents first
step1.criminalRecord: Criminal record less than 3 months old

step2.title: Our policy
step2.desc: Principium autem unde latius se funditabat, emersit ex negotio tali. Chilo ex vicario et coniux eius Maxima nomine, questi apud Olybrium ea tempestate urbi praefectum, vitamque suam venenis petitam adseverantes inpetrarunt ut hi, quos suspectati sunt, ilico rapti conpingerentur in vincula, organarius Sericus et Asbolius palaestrita et aruspex Campensis.
step2.chargeDesc: At BeDriv, we only take fees to provide enough resources to maintain our IT system working. The fees percentage is reconsidered every month.

step3.title: Online Exam
step3.sub: Do not leave the exam until your finished.
step3.examDesc: You need to obtain at least 15 out of 20.
step3.success: You pass the exam with a score of
step3.failed: You failed the exam. Please read with more attention our policy, and repass it

step4.title: Driver registration status
step4.descPending: We are currently reviewing your account to process your Driver registration.

firstGrid.title: Use BeDriv for your daily commute
firstGrid.text:
The BeDriv network is the first network of fair and responsible VTC drivers.
We don't take any commission on the races, and we offer cash back on each of your races.
On each race, thanks to the Blockchain, earn X% of "BEC" in cash-back.
You can use this cash-back directly on your next race, or take advantage of offers from some of our partners (to come).

secondGrid.title: All safe in front of the Covid
secondGrid.text:
All safe in front of the Covid
Use our services safely, thanks to the various measures we have put in place. Your safety is our priority and we do our best to accompany you on a daily basis. Don't forget:

list.two: No pick-up at the front of the vehicle.
list.three: A protective window is still present in the vehicle.
list.four: Our drivers air the cockpit after each race.
list.five: Limit your travel according to current regulations.

first.title: Practice
first.text: We accompany you everywhere, every day 24 hours a day.

second.title: Cash-Back
second.text: In addition to the low prices, we offer X% cash back on all your races!

third.title: Fair
third.text: Thanks to our 0% commission policy, we promote a fair and fair service!
